personalInfo.name: Abishek N
personalInfo.title: Software Developer | Full Stack Engineer
personalInfo.bio: Results-oriented Software Developer with 4+ years of professional experience in building scalable, high-performance web and backend systems.

hero.title: Abishek N
hero.subtitle: Building scalable, high-performance web & backend systems.

description: I am a results-oriented Software Developer with 4+ years of professional experience in building scalable, high-performance web and backend systems. I specialize in React + TypeScript frontend development and robust backend engineering using Node.js, Golang, .NET, and Python.

I have strong experience in designing enterprise-grade applications, integrating complex databases, and delivering production-ready solutions within tight timelines. I enjoy solving challenging technical problems, optimizing performance, and building clean, maintainable software.

careerObjective: To build scalable, secure, and high-performance software solutions that solve real-world business problems using modern technologies.

description: Design and develop scalable web applications and backend services.
Implement responsive, user-friendly UI using React & TypeScript.
Build and integrate REST & GraphQL APIs.
Optimize application performance and database queries.
Lead and coordinate small development teams to meet project deadlines.
Successfully delivered a complete production-ready web & mobile application within 1 month.

projects.title: Wine Platform
projects.description: A high-performance full-stack system for managing and analyzing wine data.

projects.description: AI-based intelligent agent for automatic software requirement and documentation generation.
